free.question: Ese MoveIt ni ubuntu gukoresha?
free.answer: Yego, MoveIt itanga urwego rw'ubuntu hamwe n'ibiranga by'ibanze. Gahunda za premium zirahari ku biranga byinyongera n'imipaka myinshi yo gukoresha.

plans.question: Ni iki gitandukanya gahunda za Ubuntu, Pro, na Premium?
plans.answer: Gahunda z'ubuntu zirimo ibiranga by'ibanze, Pro yongeramo ibikoresho byimbitse n'imipaka myinshi, mu gihe Premium itanga ibiranga by'urwego rw'ubucuruzi, ubufasha bwibanze, n'amahitamo yo gutunganya.

mobile.question: Ndashobora gukoresha MoveIt kuri telefoni?
mobile.answer: Yego, MoveIt ikoreshwa ku bikoresho byose kandi ikora ku bikoresho bya mobile binyuze muri aplikasiyo yacu ya web. Dutanga nanone aplikasiyo za iOS na Android.

offline.question: Ese MoveIt ikora aho nta rubuga?
offline.answer: Bimwe mu biranga bya MoveIt bisaba urubuga, ariko aplikasiyo zacu za mobile zitanga ibikorwa bike aho nta rubuga hamwe n'ubushobozi bwo guhuza iyo wongeye guhuza.

cancel.question: Ndashobora guhagarika kwishyura kwanjye igihe icyo aricyo cyose?
cancel.answer: Yego, ushobora guhagarika kwishyura kwanjye igihe icyo aricyo cyose uhereye mu migenga y'ukonto kwawe. Ukubona kwawe guzakomeza kugeza ku mperuka y'igihe cyawe cy'ubu cyo kwishyura.

security.question: Ese amakuru yanjye afite umutekano?
security.answer: Dufata umutekano w'amakuru mu buryo bukomeye. MoveIt ikoresha ubwihisho bw'urwego rw'inganda ku makuru yose, isuzuma ritegeka ry'umutekano, kandi inemera GDPR n'ayandi mategeko y'ibanga.

collaboration.question: Ese MoveIt ishyigikira ubufatanye bw'itsinda?
collaboration.answer: Yego, gahunda zacu za Pro na Premium zirimo ibiranga by'ubufatanye bw'itsinda nk'ahantu h'akazi hasangiwe, igenzura ry'uruhushya, n'ibikoresho by'ubufatanye bw'igihe gikurikirana.

support.question: Nabona nte ubufasha niba nfite ikibazo?
support.answer: Dutanga ubufasha binyuze mu kigo cyacu cy'ubufasha, ubufasha bwa email, na chat ikurikirana. Abakoresha ba Premium nabyo babona ubufasha bwibanze n'abayobozi b'ukonto bihariye.
